# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_library(v1-lexer-regex)


target_compile_options(v1-lexer-regex PRIVATE
  [=[-DGRAMMAR_STRING_CORE_SINGLE_DEFAULT="~(QUOTE_SINGLE | BACKSLASH) | (BACKSLASH .)"]=]
  [=[-DGRAMMAR_STRING_CORE_DOUBLE_DEFAULT="~(QUOTE_DOUBLE | BACKSLASH) | (BACKSLASH .)"]=]
  [=[-DGRAMMAR_MULTILINE_COMMENT_CORE_DEFAULT="(.)"]=]
  [=[-DGRAMMAR_STRING_CORE_SINGLE_ANSI="~QUOTE_SINGLE | (QUOTE_SINGLE QUOTE_SINGLE)"]=]
  [=[-DGRAMMAR_STRING_CORE_DOUBLE_ANSI="~QUOTE_DOUBLE | (QUOTE_DOUBLE QUOTE_DOUBLE)"]=]
  [=[-DGRAMMAR_MULTILINE_COMMENT_CORE_ANSI="MULTILINE_COMMENT | ."]=]
)

target_link_libraries(v1-lexer-regex PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  contrib-libs-re2
  essentials-public-issue
  essentials-parser-lexer_common
  essentials-sql-settings
  sql-v1-reflect
)

target_sources(v1-lexer-regex PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/sql/v1/lexer/regex/generic.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/sql/v1/lexer/regex/lexer.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/sql/v1/lexer/regex/regex.cpp
)
